original_text: So all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the Lord with shouts, with the sounding of rams’ horns and trumpets, and of cymbals, and the playing of lyres and harps.
korean_text: 이스라엘 무리는 크게 부르며 뿔나팔과 나팔을 불며 제금을 치며 비파와 수금을 힘있게 타며 여호와의 언약궤를 메어 올렸더라

sentences.original_text: So all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모든 이스라엘은 주의 언약 궤를 들고 올라왔습니다

sentences.original_text: with the sounding of rams' horns and trumpets
and the playing of lyres and harps
